post.desc:
Hmm... in Ran's [*Perfect Memento*](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Perfect_Memento_in_Strict_Sense/Ran_Yakumo) entry, Akyū refers to her as the pinnacle of beast yōkai. I suppose Ran did secure her spot on the throne and unite the disparate gangs of the Animal Realm under her rule.

She and her horde attacked Gensōkyō, a Yukari appeared, and then Yakumo Ran was born.
